statements: SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_id, customer_id, communication_type FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'email' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, message FROM communication_logs WHERE message LIKE '%complaint%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM communication_logs GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type, message FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM communication_logs GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_logs >= 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT communication_type FROM communication_logs ORDER BY communication_type ASC;

SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_messages >= 3 ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_id, customer_id, communication_type FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT communication_type, communication_datetime FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_datetime DESC;
SELECT communication_details FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Phone' AND customer_id = 20;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_topic, feedback_rating FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_datetime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY communication_datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT communication_type, communication_datetime FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY communication_datetime ASC;
SELECT c.log_id, c.customer_id, f.feedback_comment FROM communication_logs c LEFT JOIN feedback_data f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE f.feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_topic LIKE '%Service%' ORDER BY feedback_datetime DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(feedback_rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type, timestamp FROM communication_logs;
SELECT message FROM feedback_data WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM customer_service_agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT communication_type, message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 5001;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM customer_service_agents WHERE department = 'Sales' OR department = 'Support';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs JOIN feedback_data ON communication_logs.customer_id = feedback_data.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs;
SELECT customer_id, message, timestamp FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE communication_channel='Email' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback FROM FeedbackData WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT name, department, email FROM CustomerServiceAgents ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score, keyword_analysis FROM CustomerFeedbackAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE customer_id = '12345' AND communication_channel = 'Email' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackData WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedbackAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agent_id, name, department FROM CustomerServiceAgents WHERE department = 'Support' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT customer_id, message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_info ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, analysis_text FROM analysis_data WHERE analysis_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 456 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT analysis_text, analysis_score FROM analysis_data WHERE customer_id = 789 ORDER BY analysis_score DESC LIMIT 3;
